title: Are there any good resume writing services? - Quora

response.answer_text: We work with dozens of job seekers every month who have gotten burned by resume writing scams. I’m not sure how many of the answers listed here make it past Quora’s spam filters. Do your own due diligence when researching a resume writing service. If you’re in the U.S. or Canada - here are the best resume writing services. (You can read our in-depth guide here: 5 Best Resume Writing Services 2019 ) #1 - Zipjob  Zipjob uses both ATS technology and professional resume writers to get resumes noticed. Most companies today use an ATS (Applicant Tracking System) which automatically filter out 75% of applications. Zipjob uses the same ATS technology to ensure your resume isn’t filtered out.Zipjob writers are located in the U.S. and have backgrounds in HR, Recruiting, Career Coaching, Job Placement and Professional Writing.Zipjob has been featured in Forbes, Cheatsheet, Readers Digest & more.#2 - LinkedIn ProFinder  LinkedIn ProFinder is an excellent platform where you can find freelance resume writers. Hundreds of freelance resume writers on the platform.Allows you to review customer proposals and quotes from different freelancers.Just make sure you do your own research when working with freelancers. #3 - Topresume  Topresume is one of the largest resume writing services. Topresume has hundreds of professional resume writers in many different industries.They offer competitive pricing with packages that include cover letters and LinkedIn optimization.#4 - Fiverr  Fiverr is another platform where you can hire freelance resume writers. Fiverr is a great choice for those on a budget. Fiver has hundreds of resume writers. However, make sure the writer is from the U.S. or Canada and has at least a few dozen verified reviews.#5 - LiveCareer  LiveCareer is mainly a resume building tool but they also offer resume writing services.  You can also write your own resume if you have the time and writing skills. There are a ton of resources available online to help you get started. Be cautious of resume writing scams. There are many resume services located in third world countries that advertise here in the U.S. There are also many different “best resume services” list scams. Be cautious, do your research and get on the phone with the company before moving forward. Source and additional details here: 5 Best Resume Writing Services 2019

A Professional Resume writer can indeed help you land a new job or receive a job promotion. However, there are a lot of scams on the internet. My goal here is to a help you know how to identify a resume scam. While nothing is foolproof, learning what to look for in a resume writing services is goo, A good resume writing service can help you land a job COST OF RESUME WRITING Investment in a professional written resume is an Investment in your career And writing a professional take a lot of time and research Just because it is an investment does not imply that it will be $800. Nonetheless, It also does not suggest that a resume writing services will cost for $20 will do a fantastic job. Your job as a job hunter is to seek the services of the best you can afford. A strong, well written resume for a mid level career should not be more than $100 TOPS. A executive, however, should anticipate to pay more. Mostly I write for mid level job seekers. I am not afraid, or ashamed, to admit that I do NOT feel comfortable working with a high-end - big whig- CEO of an international conglomeration! I know my boundaries. Professional Resume Writer should Knows Their Boundaries As I explained, I write very little Senior executive resumes. I have write some, but that is not on a special case, I mostly reject them since It not my real, area of knowledge. No resume writer can know everything about every career! A resume scammer will tell you they DO. For the record, I also do not do resumes for attorneys, actors, federal resumes . You can be in sales, IT, construction, education, management, or any number of other fields and I am more than happy to assist you. I know my limitations. Every resume writer SHOULD. Guarantees money back or Job placement If a resume writer assure you that services will get you employment within a specific time frame, FIND ANOTHER WRITER! I am a resume WRITER, not a HIRING MANAGER (been there, done that!). I cannot guarantee you get a job Your interviewing skills, personality, professional skills, career background and sometimes - sheer luck- are what will GET you a job. MY JOB is to create and write a resume that markets your skills and accomplishments in a way that will make you more attractive and valuable to companies! Resume writers that provide a money back guarantee make it so incredibly difficult to get it typically, that they provide refunds RARELY. And, any resume writer can let you know how easy it is perfect for clients to scam THEM. No Revisions While a resume writer shall not offer refunds, they need to offer revisions! My clients get as much revisions as they want. Any business or resume article writer who's not willing to utilize you and make sure your satisfaction is certainly a scam!

As others have noted, there are lots of resources available online, and you can find even more by hooking up with a local networking/job-search group if you're in a city or sizable town. In general, however, striving to craft a great resume is a waste of time.  Not because a great resume can't help you get a good job or boost your pay, but because there's basically no such thing as a great resume, only resumes that resonate more strongly with the hiring team at each job for which you've applied, and each hiring team and HR person is looking for a different set of mutually contradictory things in your resume. From where I sit, it looks like your best bet is to pick one of the generally accepted resume formats used in your area and occupation, fill in your information, and double check it to make sure you haven't accidentally slipped in any errors of fact, spelling, or grammar. If you want some further reassurance run it by someone offering free resume review and take their recommendations with a grain of salt. Of course, if you're profession means you spend time thinking about page layout for print you should apply your professional skills to making a nice resume, and if you're in sales/marketing you should use your professional skills to try to tailor your resume to fit each place you're applying since the resume is a sales document you can use to show off your skills.  For everyone else the resume is generally just not helpful enough to warrant spending a lot of time on it.

I used to write resumes in Silicon Valley. No longer. Today, I recommend that you pick a local pro from LinkedIn Profinder or use Craigslist to find candidates.  By going local, you can meet with the writer and gain knowledge about bona fides, experience and price. If you are tempted to select a bargain-priced writer with a thin portfolio, expect a bargain-priced resume that fails to meet goals. I have long maintained that custom cover letters are equal in importance to the resume. And… it won’t hurt to customize each resume to specific jobs. Got Word?

Personalisation is the key to success with resume writing.  And that ISN'T something you can scale in a factory style (I'll email you my resume - please send it back somewhat improved). Of course that would show some improvement in respect of grammar, punctuation, layout. If that IS indeed what you are looking for than in that case there are plenty of these services online. However I attribute a certain level of quality to the Quora audience and I presume you want something meaningful. In that case seek companies with an individual touch or where you can speak DIRECTLY to the person writing your resume.

There are good answers here. Unfortunately, such services tend to be quite expensive (on the order of many tens, even hundreds of dollars.) Crowdsourced Résumé Review - Crowd Vitae takes a different approach, and offers free, Quora-inspired crowdsourced CV / résumé feedback and review.  Assuming you just want help with the look and feel of your résumé, check out Resumonk | Beautiful Resume Templates | Online Resume Builder. Finally, don't miss LinkedIn's admittedly not widely known Turn your LinkedIn Profile into a Resume which pretty much does exactly what it says.

We all know very well about the importance of resume during an interview. The first thing which every interviewer asks is to submit a resume. It is one of the main procedures during an interview. A resume in other words is a clear picture of yourself. It should contain each and every bit of information about yourself like: 1. Your personal information which includes name, residential address, phone number, etc. 2. Educational qualifications 3. All your achievements in extra curricular activities like sports, music, dance, etc. A resume must be written in a perfect way without any mistakes. An improper resume will not impress the interviewer and the chance of getting rejected will be the maximum. If you have any confusion about writing a perfect resume, you can avail the service of content writers at companies like Digital Content Writers India. They will give you the perfect resume which every interviewer likes. Their service expands in most of the parts in India like Bangalore, Kerala, Chennai, etc.

Some time ago, I tasted different resume writing services, and as a resume writer myself, I wasn’t truly satisfied with the quality of the documents I received. But that helped me to understand the current market, so here’s my top 5 of resume writing services: ResumeEdgeSkillroadsMonsterZetyTopResume

Yes, there are plenty, however you'll want to make sure they are Certified Professional Resume Writers. Check out my book Why Your Resume Isn't Working. There's a chapter on how to choose a service. The main thing you'll want to be careful of are cheap companies, those that just use a template, do editing and not actual writing, those who don't show samples on their website, and more.

Resume writing is highly sensitive task that can’t be handled with levity. Your Resume represents you in the presence of recruiters. You can’t assumed to be greater than your resume. Identifying good Resume Writer starts from the questions asked before payment. Good Writer must be interested in building interview-winning Resumes more than the cash he/she would collect. These are some of the questions you should expect; Can you attach your current Resume/CV please?What is your desired job/field/position (this helps in identifying keywords that are relevant to your field/job)?Do you have job(s) that is/are not included in the Resume/CV?…. and many more….Let’s work together on Lisa Resumes

As others have correctly said here an internet search will reveal a multitude of resume writing services. They will be available for your specific country and even specific location. Elsewhere on admirable Quora you will see advice about resume writing. The essence, in my opinion, is to tailor your resume to a specific job application. This means a lot of effort on your part but the work it involves researching the company to which you are applying can only help you as and when you get an interview. Good luck with your quest.

response.answer_text: I do not doubt there are. Some do capitalize on candidate insecurity.   Beware the service who you may encounter who will tell you after so many months of unemployment that your resume is not working. That's you cue to examine the whole picture, not just the resume.

Yes there are sure many. You can learn by yourself that’s what I did To find some amazing tips and building a great CV you should check out this specific course by Mr Narayan Palani’s Ultimate Resume makeover course on Udemy.

There are lots of them nowadays. All you need to do is to find the reputable one. The one which offers different services for the reasonable prices. We all know that student do not have much money. That is the other reason why to go to Prime Writings site cause they try to meet the student’s budget. I personally use it too and I am happy about their help.

As per research, the human mind can grasp visual storytelling faster than common boring writeups, as the colorful images grab the attention of our minds. We incorporate this idea into our resume. A resume is the most important individual marketing tool designed to engage the hiring manager of an organization in order to get you an interview, and eventually to land you in the Job. We take the information in the text or numerical form and then condense the same into a combination of images & text to make it look phenomenal and allowing recruiters to engage with the essential insights of the data quickly. Recruiters review hundreds of resumes on a daily

I would strongly recommend Ryno Resumes. I am sure they will help you to land your dream job.

Yes, there are a lot of good Resume writing services like Textual resume, Infographic and social profiler. Would recommend you to go with way2writers as they provide excellently resume writing services

Topresume is one of the largest resume writing services. Topresume has hundreds of professional resume writers in many different industries. They offer competitive pricing with packages that include cover letters and LinkedIn optimization.

For the Indian Industry one can try Expertscribe. They have been primarily into helping students with Personal statements, statements of purpose till now and have earned a good reputation in this space. Given the strength of the professionals on their board, they are providing resume editing services too and are doing well.
If you are looking for free software, Microsoft Word has some cool resume/CV templates. I believe the online resume creators are paid services. (And please don’t use the template provided by TCS)
The best one in the UK is CV Writing UK run by Ian Viner who meets all of his clients in person and spends a day with you really drawing out your key skills and achievements
You can probably take a course, maybe even an online course through your public library for FREE.
Me.
